scripts.dev: npm run build:packages && npm run db:generate && npm -w apps/api run dev
scripts.dev:api: npm run build:packages && npm run db:generate && npm -w apps/api run dev
scripts.dev:game: npm run build:packages && npm -w apps/game-server run dev
scripts.dev:worker: npm run build:packages && npm -w apps/worker run dev
scripts.dev:backoffice: npm run build:packages && npm -w apps/backoffice run dev
scripts.build:packages: npm -w packages/shared run build && npm -w packages/contracts run build && npm -w packages/core run build

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run db:generate && npm run build:apps

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:packages && npm run typecheck:apps
